languages.text: "Бойцов у меня нет, зато есть партия оружия нелюдей, убойного, но без гарантии качества — поди пойми, как оно вообще работает. Но всяко лучше, чем та дрянь, которой вооружены головорезы Владайма. Угощу их за счет заведения".

traits.locale_text: "Бойцов у меня нет, зато есть партия оружия нелюдей, убойного, но без гарантии качества — поди пойми, как оно вообще работает. Но всяко лучше, чем та дрянь, которой вооружены головорезы Владайма. Угощу их за счет заведения".
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "I don't have any fighters, but I do have a shipment of xenos weapons. Lethal, but with no guarantee of quality. Figuring out how it even works is tricky enough. But that still beats the junk Vladaym's thugs are armed with. They can have a round on the house."
languages.original_text: "Бойцов у меня нет, зато есть партия оружия нелюдей, убойного, но без гарантии качества — поди пойми, как оно вообще работает. Но всяко лучше, чем та дрянь, которой вооружены головорезы Владайма. Угощу их за счет заведения".

traits.locale_text: "I don't have any fighters, but I do have a shipment of non-human weapons. Lethal, but with no guarantee of quality. Figuring out how it even works is tricky enough. But that still beats the junk Vladaym's cutthroats are armed with. They can have a round on the house."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "I don't have any fighters, but I do have a shipment of non-human weapons. Lethal, but with no guarantee of quality. Figuring out how it even works is tricky enough. But that still beats the junk Vladaym's cutthroats are armed with. They can have a round on the house."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "I don't have any fighters, but I do have a shipment of non-human weapons. Lethal, but with no guarantee of quality. Figuring out how it even works is tricky enough. But that still beats the junk Vladaym's cutthroats are armed with. They can have a round on the house."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "I don't have any fighters, but I do have a shipment of non-human weapons. Lethal, but with no guarantee of quality. Figuring out how it even works is tricky enough. But that still beats the junk Vladaym's cutthroats are armed with. They can have a round on the house."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "I don't have any fighters, but I do have a shipment of xenos weapons. Lethal, but with no guarantee of quality. Figuring out how it even works is tricky enough. But that still beats the junk Vladaym's thugs are armed with. They can have a round on the house."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "I don't have any fighters, but I do have a shipment of xenos weapons. Lethal, but with no guarantee of quality. Figuring out how it even works is tricky enough. But that still beats the junk Vladaym's thugs are armed with. They can have a round on the house."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: “我没法提供战士，但我这里有一批异形武器。火力相当厉害，但质量没法保证，光是弄清楚这些武器怎么用已经够让人头疼了。不过，这堆武器还是比弗拉迪姆的人拿着的那些破烂强多了。这批武器就算是我的赞助吧。”
languages.original_text: "I don't have any fighters, but I do have a shipment of xenos weapons. Lethal, but with no guarantee of quality. Figuring out how it even works is tricky enough. But that still beats the junk Vladaym's thugs are armed with. They can have a round on the house."

traits.locale_text: “我没法提供战士，但我这里有一批异形武器。火力相当厉害，但质量没法保证，光是弄清楚这些武器怎么用已经够让人头疼了。不过，这对武器还是比弗拉迪姆的暴徒用的那些破烂强多了。这批武器就算是我的赞助吧。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: 「戦士はいませんが、異種族の武器ならありますよ。致命的な武器ですが、品質の保証はありません。まず仕組みを理解すること自体が難しいでしょう。でも、ヴラダイムの舎弟たちが持っているガラクタよりは優っています。家に一撃食らわしてやることくらいは出来ますよ」
languages.original_text: "I don't have any fighters, but I do have a shipment of xenos weapons. Lethal, but with no guarantee of quality. Figuring out how it even works is tricky enough. But that still beats the junk Vladaym's thugs are armed with. They can have a round on the house."

traits.locale_text: 「戦士はいませんが、異種族の武器ならありますよ。致命的な武器ですが、品質の保証はありません。まず仕組みを理解すること自体が難しいでしょう。でも、ヴラダイムの舎弟たちが持っているガラクタよりは優っています。家に一撃食らわしてやることくらいは出来ますよ」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: «No tengo guerreros, pero sí un cargamento de armas xenos. Letales, pero sin garantía de calidad. Averiguar cómo funcionan es bastante complicado, pero es mejor que la basura con la que van armados los matones de Vladaym. Les puedo invitar a una ronda».
languages.original_text: "I don't have any fighters, but I do have a shipment of xenos weapons. Lethal, but with no guarantee of quality. Figuring out how it even works is tricky enough. But that still beats the junk Vladaym's thugs are armed with. They can have a round on the house."

traits.locale_text: «No tengo guerreros, pero sí un cargamento de armas no humanas. Letales, pero sin garantía de calidad. Averiguar cómo funcionan es bastante complicado, pero es mejor que la basura con la que van armados los sicarios de Vladaym. Les puedo invitar a una ronda».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Ich habe keine Kämpfer, aber ich habe eine Lieferung Xenos-Waffen. Tödlich, aber ohne Qualitätsgarantie. Es ist schon knifflig genug, herauszufinden, wie sie überhaupt funktionieren. Aber das ist immer noch besser als der Schrott, mit dem Vladayms Schläger bewaffnet sind. Die kriegen einen Shot aufs Haus."
languages.original_text: "I don't have any fighters, but I do have a shipment of xenos weapons. Lethal, but with no guarantee of quality. Figuring out how it even works is tricky enough. But that still beats the junk Vladaym's thugs are armed with. They can have a round on the house."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe keine Kämpfer, aber ich habe eine Lieferung nicht-menschlicher Waffen. Tödlich, aber ohne Qualitätsgarantie. Es ist schon knifflig genug, herauszufinden, wie sie überhaupt funktionieren. Aber das ist immer noch besser als der Schrott, mit dem Vladayms Halsabschneider bewaffnet sind. Die kriegen einen Shot aufs Haus."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: « À défaut de pouvoir vous fournir des combattants, j'ai une cargaison d'armes xénos. Elles sont puissantes, mais je ne garantis pas leur qualité ; c'est déjà compliqué de réussir à les faire fonctionner. Enfin, c'est toujours mieux que la camelote dont les bandits de Vladaym sont équipés. Je leur offrirai une tournée pour compenser. »
languages.original_text: "I don't have any fighters, but I do have a shipment of xenos weapons. Lethal, but with no guarantee of quality. Figuring out how it even works is tricky enough. But that still beats the junk Vladaym's thugs are armed with. They can have a round on the house."

traits.locale_text: « À défaut de pouvoir vous fournir des combattants, j'ai une cargaison d'armes non humaines que je peux mettre à votre disposition. Elles sont puissantes, mais je ne garantis pas leur qualité ; c'est déjà compliqué de réussir à les faire fonctionner. Enfin, c'est toujours mieux que la camelote dont les bandits de Vladaym sont équipés. Je leur offrirai une tournée pour compenser. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Elimde savaşçı yok ama bir parti zeno silahım var. Öldürmeye öldürür ama kalitesi meçhuldür. Nasıl çalıştığını anlamak bile zor iş. Gerçi Vladaym'ın haydutlarının kullandığı çöplerden her türlü iyidir. İkram olsun."
languages.original_text: "I don't have any fighters, but I do have a shipment of xenos weapons. Lethal, but with no guarantee of quality. Figuring out how it even works is tricky enough. But that still beats the junk Vladaym's thugs are armed with. They can have a round on the house."
